alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or near Miramar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Medley, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Palm Springs North, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Pennsuco and Country Club. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
